prompts: Create a cute Pokemon that can change its appearance based on its mood.
Imagine a fluffy creature that has a half-light and half-dark design.
Generate an electric-type Pokemon that looks like a small rodent with a split color scheme.
Show me a Pokemon that has both cheerful and mischievous expressions.
Design a Pokemon that can adapt to different environments, appearing in various colors.
Give me a small Pokemon that thrives in urban settings and has a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that features unique traits from both light and dark types.
